mapper.insert: insert into recipe (title, servings, cooking_time, difficulty, img_url) values (#{title}, #{servings}, #{cooking_time}, #{difficulty}, #{img_url});
insert into ingredient (recipe_id, ingredient_name, ingredient_amount) values (#{recipe_id}, #{ingredient_name}, #{ingredient_amount});
mapper.select: select recipe.recipe_id, step.instruction from recipe left join step on recipe.recipe_id = step.recipe_id where recipe.recipe_id= #{recipe_id}
select recipe.recipe_id, ingredient.ingredient_name, ingredient.ingredient_amount from recipe left join ingredient on recipe.recipe_id = ingredient.recipe_id where recipe.recipe_id= #{recipe_id}
